title: Agentic AI Kanban
subtitle: Personal
description: TaskBoardAI is a lightweight, file-based kanban board system designed for AI agents and human-in-the-loop collaboration. It bridges the gap between AI assistants and human project management, allowing both to maintain and manipulate shared project boards with synchronized updates.
bullets: MCP Server integration for AI assistant compatibility
JSON-based architecture for easy AI parsing
Rich markdown with subtasks and dependencies

props.title: Project Development Process
props.description: The key phases in developing the AI-powered kanban board project

stages.name: Research
stages.description: Studied existing kanban tools and identified opportunities for AI integration

stages.name: Planning
stages.description: Defined project scope, features, and technical architecture

stages.name: Design
stages.description: Created wireframes, user flows, and visual design for the application

stages.name: Development
stages.description: Built the React front-end, Node.js backend, and integrated AI capabilities

stages.name: Testing
stages.description: Conducted user testing and gathered feedback for improvements

slides.alt: Development process timeline for the Agentic AI Kanban project

props.title: Task Management Flow
props.description: Key user journey through the AI task management process

flowSteps.label: Task Creation
flowSteps.title: Creating a New Task
flowSteps.description: Users create a new task by entering a title, description, and optional attachments
flowSteps.systemResponse: The system creates the task and triggers AI analysis to suggest categorization and priority
decisionPoints: User can accept or modify AI suggestions
User can assign the task to team members

flowSteps.label: AI Processing
flowSteps.title: AI Task Analysis
flowSteps.description: The system uses AI to analyze task content and provide intelligent suggestions
flowSteps.systemResponse: AI identifies key information, suggests tags, estimates complexity, and recommends priority level
decisionPoints: System determines if task requires special handling
System identifies related tasks and dependencies

flowSteps.label: Board Placement
flowSteps.title: Task Board Placement
flowSteps.description: The task is placed on the kanban board based on its status and category
userActions: Drag task to different column if needed
flowSteps.systemResponse: System updates task metadata and triggers any automation rules

flowSteps.label: Progress Tracking
flowSteps.title: Task Progress Tracking
flowSteps.description: Users and AI work together to track and update task progress
flowSteps.systemResponse: AI provides insights on potential blockers and suggests optimizations based on progress patterns

slides.alt: User flow diagram for task management in the Agentic AI Kanban project
Technology stack visualization for Agentic AI Kanban

title: Nutrien
subtitle: Safety Portal
description: Nutrien, the world's largest provider of crop inputs and services, needed a solution to streamline safety document management across 1300 branch locations. The Operating Standards feature simplifies how staff download required global documents and upload completed forms while maintaining compliance.
bullets: Designed an intuitive interface connecting global standards with local branch files
Created responsive components that maintain consistent sizing across all devices
Used user testing insights to identify and address critical compliance concerns
Improved document organization to prevent errors in safety audits

props.name: Maria Rodriguez
goals: Ensure branch compliance with all safety regulations
Minimize time spent on administrative paperwork
Train new employees on safety procedures accurately
Prevent safety incidents through proper documentation
painPoints: Struggles to locate the correct global documents for local implementation
Worries about accidentally overwriting or deleting important files
Finds it difficult to track which forms have been completed
behaviors: Accesses the safety portal 2-3 times per week
Prefers to batch-process safety documentation tasks
Often works from different devices (office PC, tablet in the field)
Carefully double-checks all submissions before finalizing
props.quote: I need to be 100% certain we're compliant. When auditors come, there's no room for mistakes with our documentation.

slides.alt: User persona for Nutrien Branch Safety Coordinator
Knowledge Mapping - Documenting complex SharePoint structures to improve team understanding
Design Exploration - Moving from modal interactions to a dedicated Operating Standards page
Before and after comparison of the Nutrien safety portal interface
Final Design - Visual connection between global standards and local branch files
Multi-file Uploader - Consistent component sizing across all breakpoints

metrics.name: Task Completion Rate
metrics.description: Percentage of tasks completed successfully without assistance

metrics.name: Error Rate
metrics.description: Reduction in user errors compared to previous interface

metrics.name: User Satisfaction
metrics.description: Average satisfaction score from post-test surveys

tasks.name: Replace an existing document
tasks.description: Update an outdated safety form with a new version

insights.title: File Overwrite Concerns
insights.description: 5 out of 6 users expressed concerns about accidentally overwriting existing files during the upload process.
insights.action: Added a confirmation dialog with clear visual indicators showing which files would be replaced.

insights.title: Visual Connection Between Global and Local
insights.description: Users appreciated the clear visual connection between global standards and local implementation files.

insights.title: Mobile Usage Higher Than Expected
insights.description: 4 out of 6 users reported they would need to access the system from mobile devices in the field.
insights.action: Enhanced responsive design to ensure consistent component sizing across all breakpoints.

slides.alt: Usability testing results and impact metrics for Nutrien Safety Portal

title: Worldplay
subtitle: Analytics Dashboard
description: Worldplay needed a comprehensive analytics dashboard to help content publishers understand viewer engagement and optimize their video strategies. The dashboard provides real-time insights into viewer behavior, content performance, and revenue metrics.

variants.name: Body Large
variants.sample: The analytics dashboard provides comprehensive insights into viewer engagement patterns.

variants.name: Body
variants.sample: Track performance metrics across different content categories and platforms.

variants.name: Small
variants.sample: Data refreshes automatically every 5 minutes. Last updated: 2:30 PM.

components.name: Data Cards
components.description: Cards displaying key metrics with optional trend indicators and comparison data

components.name: Line Charts
components.description: Interactive line charts for time-series data visualization

components.name: Filter Controls
components.description: Consistent filter patterns for refining dashboard views

slides.alt: Analytics technology stack for Worldplay dashboard

title: Shaw
subtitle: Phone Portal
description: Shaw Communications needed a comprehensive user portal for their phone service customers. The redesigned portal helps customers manage their accounts, view call history, configure features, and get support for their phone services.
bullets: Visual call history and usage tracking
